tika-s0304t3:2_1: gotrabhunā vivaṭṭitamānasassa maggena sacchikaraṇenāti attho. Sacchikiriyamānañhi
tika-s0304t3:2_2: taṁ adhigantvā ārammaṇapaccayabhūtañca paṭicca adhipatipaccayabhūte ca tasmiṁ paramassāsabhāvena
tika-s0304t3:2_3: vimuttasaṅkhārassa paramagatibhāvena ca patiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāya khayasaṅkhāto
tika-s0304t3:2_4: maggo rāgādike khepetīti taṁsacchikaraṇābhāve rāgādīnaṁ anuppattinirodhagamanābhāvato
tika-s0304t3:3_0: Imināva suttenāti imināva jambukhādakasuttena. Kilesakkhayamattaṁ nibbānanti vadeyya
tika-s0304t3:3_2: “kassā”tiādi. Addhā attanoti vakkhati “parassa kilesakkhayena parassa nibbānasampatti
tika-s0304t3:3_3: na yuttā”ti. Nibbānārammaṇakaraṇena gotrabhukkhaṇe kilesakkhayappattitā ca āpannāti
tika-s0304t3:3_4: āha – “kiṁ pana tesu akhīṇesuyevā”tiādi. Nanu ārammaṇakaraṇamattena kilesakkhayo
tika-s0304t3:3_5: anuppattoti na sakkā vattuṁ. Cittañhi atītānāgatādisabbaṁ ālambanaṁ karoti, na nipphannamevāti.
tika-s0304t3:3_6: Gotrabhūpi maggena yā kilesānaṁ anuppattidhammatā kātabbā, taṁ ārabbha pavattissatīti?
tika-s0304t3:3_7: Na, appattanibbānassa nibbānārammaṇañāṇābhāvato. Na hi aññe dhammā viya nibbānaṁ,
tika-s0304t3:3_8: taṁ pana atigambhīrattā appattena ālambituṁ na sakkā, tasmā tena gotrabhunā pattabbena
tika-s0304t3:3_10: gotrabhuto puretaraṁ nipphannena kilesakkhayena bhavitabbaṁ. Appattakilesakkhayārammaṇakaraṇe
tika-s0304t3:4_0: Tasmātiādi vuttasseva atthassa nigamanaṁ. Taṁ panetaṁ nibbānaṁ. Rūpino dhammā arūpino
tika-s0304t3:4_1: dhammātiādīsūti ādisaddena lokuttaraanāsavādīnaṁ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Arūpadhammādibhāvaggahaṇena
tika-s0304t3:4_2: cassa parinipphannatā dīpitā. Tenāha “na kilesakkhayamattamevā”ti. Kilesakkhayamattatāya
tika-s0304t3:4_3: hi sati nibbānassa bahutā āpajjati “yattakā kilesā khīyanti, tattakāni nibbānānī”ti.
tika-s0304t3:4_4: Abhāvassabhāvato gambhīrādibhāvo asaṅkhatādibhāvo ca na siyā, vutto ca so nibbānassa,
tika-s0304t3:4_5: tasmāssa paccetabbo parinipphannabhāvo. Yasmā ca sammutisaccārammaṇaṁ saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṁ
tika-s0304t3:4_6: vā samucchedavasena kilese pajahituṁ na sakkoti, yato mahaggatañāṇaṁ vipassanāñāṇaṁ
tika-s0304t3:4_7: vā kilesavikkhambhanavasena tadaṅgavasena vā pajahati, tasmā ariyamaggañāṇassa sammutisaccasaṅkhatadhammārammaṇehi
tika-s0304t3:4_8: viparītasabhāvena ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṁ. Tathā hi taṁ samucchedavasena kilese pajahīti
tika-s0304t3:7_0: 316-328.Pahāya gatattāti ariyamaggena jahitvā ñāṇagamanena gatattā. Suṭṭhu gatāti
tika-s0304t3:7_1: sammā gatā paṭipannāti sugatā. Parijānanatthanti tīhi pariññāhi parijānanatthaṁ.
tika-s0304t3:7_2: Dukkhasaṅkhātoti “dukkha”nti saṅkhātabbo viditabbo ca dukkhasabhāvo dhammo dukkhadukkhatā.
tika-s0304t3:7_3: Yasmā dukkhavedanāvinimuttasaṅkhatadhamme sukhavedanāya ca yathā idha saṅkhāradukkhatā
tika-s0304t3:7_4: vipariṇāmadukkhatāti dukkhapariyāyo niruppateva, tasmā dukkhasabhāvo dhammo ekena
tika-s0304t3:7_6: vipariṇāmadukkhatāti etasmiṁ padadvaye. Saṅkhārabhāvena dukkhasabhāvo saṅkhāradukkhatā.
tika-s0304t3:10: 329.Pabbajjāyāti pabbajitapaṭipattiyaṁ. Dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhūti dhammānudhammaṁ paṭipajjamāno bhikkhu. Pātanti pāto. Nacirassanti khippameva. Tenāha “lahuyevā”ti.
